alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Kaufman; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 3:51AM CDT until June 16 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN KAUFMAN...SOUTHERN VAN ZANDT AND HENDERSON COUNTIES... At 347 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Van to Martins Mill, moving southeast at 55 mph. The strongest wind gusts are expected along and south of highway 64 in southern Van Zandt and northern Henderson county...Mainly the Ben Wheeler, Edom, Redland, Brownsboro, and Chandler areas. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Athens, Kaufman, Gun Barrel City, Canton, Mabank, Chandler, Van, Malakoff, Tool, Combine, Seven Points, Kemp, Brownsboro, Eustace, Trinidad, Edom, Grays Prairie, Enchanted Oaks, Caney City and Cottonwood. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
